topic.title: POINT OF DELIVERY FURTHER DETAIL CODE
topic.shortdesc: The further detail code of the Point of Delivery for an ACTIVITY, event or item in a SERVICE PROVIDED UNDER AGREEMENT, where the Point of Delivery has been identified as requiring more information.
